title: The Amazing Transparent Man (Crime, 1960) Directed by Edgar G. Ulmer | Colorized Movie

sources.title: The Amazing Transparent Man (Crime, 1960) Directed by Edgar G. Ulmer | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
A nation at his mercy! What you can't see will kill you! 
A crazed scientist invents an invisibility formula. He plans to use the formula to create an army of invisible zombies.

Original title: The Amazing Transparent Man (1960)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/3QH-e6NyPAg


Director: Edgar G. Ulmer
Writer: Jack Lewis
Stars: Marguerite Chapman, Douglas Kennedy, James Griffith, Ivan Triesault
Genres: Cult Film, Sci-Fi, Horror, Crime, Colorized Classics
Budget: $100,000


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
00:21 A man is recruited by a mysterious commander for a dangerous experiment involving safecracking and living matter.
10:30 A scientist demonstrates a powerful machine to a skeptical man, leading to unexpected consequences.
22:37 Intrigue and betrayal unfold as characters navigate a dangerous world of secrets and promises.
27:36 Intrigue and negotiation unfold between characters in a secret operation.
35:47 Intrigue and betrayal surround a scientist's invention of an invisibility ray with deadly consequences.
42:20 A criminal becomes invisible after a robbery, causing chaos and betrayal among his associates.
50:26 A man with radiation poisoning is manipulated into becoming invisible for a dangerous mission.
